# deferredPaymentRequest

**Instance Property**

A property that requests a recurring payment, such as a hotel booking or a pre-order.

## Declaration

```swift
ApplePayDeferredPaymentRequest deferredPaymentRequest;
```
title: deferredPaymentRequest
